attributes.action: Stop hatred websites such as http://www.prophetmohammed.co.uk/
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Website such as these that cause hatred towards others religion should be stopped, it is the basic civil liberty of every citizen "the right to practice religion". The servers should disregard and block all websited that cause hatred towards all religions, for servers in the UK.
